description:
Responsible for managing the discovery, curation and engagement of partnerships and investments relevant to the Direct Consumer Lending business and all associated compliance and reporting. Working with internal and external stakeholders to ensure that the right strategic partners are effectively found, projects are efficiently executed, and right opportunities are advanced and reported on. Complete market research and be an expert at evaluating and discovering companies that fit with the Banks strategic needs. Keep abreast of trends in relevant landscapes and adjacent industries to identify potential opportunities or challenges before they become mainstream. Build strong relationships with external partners to help us advance and mature the consumer lending opportunities at U.S. Bank. Collaborate with peers across the Bank's business lines to ensure efficient execution of partnership opportunities and serve as pint of escalation for any issues. Work closely with senior leaders across the DCL team to understand their strategic needs and priorities, being able to turn those into communications tools and marketing collateral to effectively communicate these both externally and internally. Basic Qualifications - Bachelor's degree, or equivalent work experience - 10 or more years of related experience Preferred Skills/Experience - Extensive understanding of consumer trends and markets - Direct Consumer Lending experince - Advanced knowledge and experience researching trends, topics and companies - Expert skills in using CRM tools, running reporting and performing data analysis - Extensive experience developing business cases in new or advanced product lines - Significant experience collaborating with large teams using effective communication - Broad understanding and practical application of applicable laws and regulations - Good organizational, managerial and cross-functional project management skills - Well-developed customer relations skills - Excellent interpersonal and verbal and written communication skills - Ability to collaborate with large teams, problem solve, and work independently when necessary - Experience with design thinking methodology and working in an agile and waterfall environment a plus
